parameter.name: increment_size
parameter.comment: How many items preallocate in advance

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_get_element_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position the target element is located

returns.comment: The element located at the @position in the @array

method.comment: Gets the element located in the @position in the @array. NULL if position if out of bound.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_size
method.comment: Gets the size of the array.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_find

returns.comment: The index of the value in the @array, or an index out of bounds, if not found.

method.comment: Searches for a value in the @array and returns its first index.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_append
method.comment: Appends the @value into the @array, not checking for duplicates. See also i_cal_vcard_str_array_add().

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_add
method.comment: Adds the @value into the @array, omitting duplicates. See also i_cal_vcard_str_array_append().

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_remove_element_at

parameter.name: position
parameter.comment: The position in which the element will be removed from the array

method.comment: Removes the element at the @position from the array.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_remove
method.comment: Removes all the occurrences of the @value in the @array.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_str_array_clone

returns.comment: The newly cloned #ICalVcardStrArray with the same value as the @array

method.comment: Creates a deep copy of #ICalVcardStrArray with the same properties as the @array.
